\documentclass{standalone}

\usepackage{tikz}
\usetikzlibrary{calc}

\begin{document}

\begin{tikzpicture}

    \tikzset{stagegame/.pic={
    \node [draw, color=red] (A) at (0, 0) {\(A\)};
        \node [draw, color=blue] (B1) at ($(A) + (-5, -1)$) {\(B_1\)};
            \node [draw] (O1) at ($(B1) + (-2.5, -1)$) {\tiny{\(O_1\)}};
            \node (SS) at ($(O1) + (0, -.5)$) {\((3, 2)\)};
            \node [draw] (O2) at ($(B1) + (2.5, -1)$) {\tiny{\(O_2\)}};
            \node (SC) at ($(O2) + (0, -.5)$) {\((1, 1)\)};
        \node [draw, color=blue] (B2) at ($(A) + (5, -1)$) {\(B_2\)};
            \node [draw] (O3) at ($(B2) + (-2.5, -1)$) {\tiny{\(O_3\)}};
            \node (CS) at ($(O3) + (0, -.5)$) {\((0, 0)\)};
            \node [draw] (O4) at ($(B2) + (2.5, -1)$) {\tiny{\(O_4\)}};
            \node (CC) at ($(O4) + (0, -.5)$) {\((2, 3)\)};
    \draw (A) -- node[left=5mm, midway] {S} (B1);
    \draw (A) -- node[right=5mm, midway] {C} (B2);
        \draw (B1)  -- node[left=3mm, midway] {S}  (O1);
        \draw (B1) -- node[right=3mm, midway] {C} (O2);
    \draw (A) -- (B2);
        \draw (B2)  -- node[left=3mm, midway] {S}  (O3);
        \draw (B2) -- node[right=3mm, midway] {C} (O4);

    \draw  [dashed, thick] ($(B1) + (-.65, .3)$) rectangle  ($(B2) + (.65, -.3)$);
        }
    }
    \pic[scale=1.1]{stagegame};
    \tikzset{repeatedstagegame/.pic={
    \node [draw, color=red] (A) at (0, 0) {\(A\)};
        \node [draw, color=blue] (B1) at ($(A) + (-1.25, -1)$) {\(B_1\)};
            \node [draw] (O1) at ($(B1) + (-.5, -1)$) {\tiny{\(O_1\)}};
            \node (SS) at ($(O1) + (0, -.5)$) {\((3, 2)\)};
            \node [draw] (O2) at ($(B1) + (.5, -1)$) {\tiny{\(O_2\)}};
            \node (SC) at ($(O2) + (0, -.5)$) {\((1, 1)\)};
        \node [draw, color=blue] (B2) at ($(A) + (1.25, -1)$) {\(B_2\)};
            \node [draw] (O3) at ($(B2) + (-.5, -1)$) {\tiny{\(O_3\)}};
            \node (CS) at ($(O3) + (0, -.5)$) {\((0, 0)\)};
            \node [draw] (O4) at ($(B2) + (.5, -1)$) {\tiny{\(O_4\)}};
            \node (CC) at ($(O4) + (0, -.5)$) {\((2, 3)\)};
        \draw (A) -- node[left=.5mm, midway] {S} (B1);
        \draw (A) -- node[right=.5mm, midway] {C} (B2);
        \draw (B1)  -- node[left=.5mm, midway] {S}  (O1);
        \draw (B1) -- node[right=.5mm, midway] {C} (O2);
        \draw (A) -- (B2);
        \draw (B2)  -- node[left=.5mm, midway] {S}  (O3);
        \draw (B2) -- node[right=.5mm, midway] {C} (O4);

        \draw  [dashed, thick] ($(B1) + (-.65, .3)$) rectangle  ($(B2) + (.65, -.3)$);
        }
    }
    \pic at ($(SS) + (0, -.5)$) [scale=1.1]{repeatedstagegame};
    \pic at ($(A) + (5.5, 0)$) [scale=1.1]{repeatedstagegame};
    \pic at ($(A) + (5.5, 0)$) [scale=1.1]{repeatedstagegame};
    \pic at ($(A) + (5.5, 0)$) [scale=1.1]{repeatedstagegame};

\end{tikzpicture}

\end{document}
